name: Daniel Rey Cimafranca
text: The book came out years ago, and it had to rely on quantifiable data that management at the time can digest, thus the communications channel perspective.  IMO the root cause is thinking that software development is a mechanical task when it's not - it's analytical and creative and the overhead is there to make sure everyone is on the same page.  Sure anyone can be replaced but you won't get the same expertise and quality of work.
